info.+content: Azuma Kazuma isn't terribly clever, but he's got a good heart and great skill - at baking. Since childhood, he's been on a quest to create the perfect bread to represent Japan internationally. Now, he seeks to enter the famous bakery Pantasia, in hopes of reaching his goal. But plots abound...
#2: "To All Tha Dreamers" by SOUL'd OUT (eps 13-29)
YAKITATE-JAPAN.COM -焼きたて!!ジャぱんコム-
